findings.details: In-page anchor navigation can land under the sticky header; add scroll margin for post/page headings.
Section headings could be more visually scannable, especially on mobile.
No obvious placeholder/example.com links detected in content scan. External URLs not live-checked in offline audit.
Pages include description/keywords and SEO tags in layout.
Post content typography is solid; heading hierarchy could use stronger visual anchors.

recommendations: Add scroll margin for headings to avoid sticky header overlap
Add subtle heading accents to improve section scannability on long posts
